amendment.description: An amendment numbered 53 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funding for the Treasury Department's Climate Hub.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fry amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fry amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
